thread.title: Andrea Bocelli’s Music Video for His Duet With Ariana Grande Titled ‘E Piu Ti Penso’
thread.title_full: Andrea Bocelli’s Music Video for His Duet With Ariana Grande Titled ‘E Piu Ti Penso’

author: Editorial Dept
title: Andrea Bocelli’s Music Video for His Duet With Ariana Grande Titled ‘E Piu Ti Penso’
text:
0 comments 

Andrea Bocelli released the video for his collaboration single with Ariana Grande titled “E Piu Ti Penso.” The video features the two stars being filmed in two different cities with Bocelli in Rome, Italy and Ariana Grande in Tokyo, Japan. 
“E Piu Ti Penso” is featured on the soundtrack of the 1984 film “Once Upon a Time In America”, but Bocelli’s cover will appear on his upcoming album which is titled “Cinema” and scheduled to drop on October 23. 
Ariana Grande’s is gearing up to release her new single “Focus” on October 30. Her album titled “Moonlight,” currently has no release date. Related
